name: Cyberpunk 2021
description:
Test your skills in the arena, how many can you kill and how long can you survive in Night City. 

Level up and kill more!

Control:

  • W-A-S-D: Movement
  • R: Reload
  • Left-click: Shoot
  • Spacebar: Jump
  • 1-2-3: Switch guns

Software Used:

  • Maya
  • Blender
  • Photoshop/Clip Studio Paint
  • Substance Painter/Designer
  • Unity
  • Visual Studio
  • GitKraken
  • Audacity
